table_name: Industry Financial Metrics and Risk Assessment
table_summary: This table provides a comprehensive overview of financial metrics and risk assessments for various industries. It includes data on the number of firms in each industry, beta values, debt-to-equity ratios, effective tax rates, unlevered beta values, cash as a percentage of firm value, and corrected unlevered beta values. Additionally, it contains risk metrics such as HiLo risk, standard deviation of equity, and standard deviation in operating income over the last 10 years. The table also includes financial data for the years 2020 to 2024, offering insights into the financial performance and risk profiles of different industries over time.
